ygData.subject: Re: Where to hunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: Druids in Rathe Mountains are harder now, at 27th they were all RED and GREEN , no blue even or yellow I had my 38th Gnome Wiz out that way just this past
ygData.messageBody:
Druids in Rathe Mountains are harder now, at 27th they were all RED and
GREEN , no blue even or yellow


I had my 38th Gnome Wiz out that way just this past week, after the most
recent patch. 2 of the druids were green to me. Three of them were red to
me and one was yellow. The only one that was yellow was the one that moves
around a bit. The Unkept druids that wander in the area were all still
green and gave the same faction as before

Of the three Red Druids, all three were red to the 45th warrior that was in
my group. So yeah, I would say they got a slight level increase, since the
woman wood elf was blue to me at 30, now being red at 45th.

Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
